question: Match the compounds given in List - I with the items given in List - II.
List - I: I. Benzenesulphonyl Chloride, II. Sulphanilic acid, III. Alkyl Diazonium salts, IV. Aryl Diazonium salts
List - II: a. Zwitterion, b. Hinsberg reagent, c. Dyes, d. Conversion to alcohols
explanation: Alkyl diazonium salts are unstable and convert to alcohols (III-d).
Aryl diazonium salts form Azo dyes (IV-c).
